Html:
I know Rawr isn't optimized for PvP, though I still model my character to determine the DPS upgrades to the best of my ability. During this, I realized that my resilience was exactly 100 short. That made me realize that the armor set bonuses for Gladiator set isn't displaying. Will this be fixed?

 

PS: This is on my tankadin.
I guess this should be fixed, as this could potentially be an issue with actual tanks (DKs, in particular) who might be using two pieces of high-level PvP gear to tank ICC content.
